snippet: If you turned 70½ in 2014 and have an individual retirement account, you have until April 1 to make your first withdrawal.
lead_paragraph: If you turned 70½ in 2014 and have an individual retirement account, you have until April 1 to make your first withdrawal.

headline.print_headline: When You Must Start Taking Money Out of an I.R.A. or 401(K)
headline.main: When You Must Take Money Out of Your I.R.A. or 401(k)
